name: fod2fixel
description:
Perform segmentation of continuous Fibre Orientation Distributions (FODs) to produce discrete fixels.



References:

* Reference for the FOD segmentation method:
Smith, R. E.; Tournier, J.-D.; Calamante, F. & Connelly, A. SIFT: Spherical-deconvolution informed filtering of tractograms. NeuroImage, 2013, 67, 298-312 (Appendix 2)

* Reference for Apparent Fibre Density (AFD):
Raffelt, D.; Tournier, J.-D.; Rose, S.; Ridgway, G.R.; Henderson, R.; Crozier, S.; Salvado, O.; Connelly, A. Apparent Fibre Density: a novel measure for the analysis of diffusion-weighted magnetic resonance images.Neuroimage, 2012, 15;59(4), 3976-94
author: MRTrix3 Developers

inputs.name: fod
inputs.description: the input fod image.

inputs.name: fixel_directory
inputs.description: the output fixel directory

inputs.name: afd
inputs.description: output the total Apparent Fibre Density per fixel (integral of FOD lobe)

inputs.name: peak_amp
inputs.description: output the amplitude of the FOD at the maximal peak per fixel

inputs.name: disp
inputs.description: output a measure of dispersion per fixel as the ratio between FOD lobe integral and maximal peak amplitude

inputs.name: fmls_integral
inputs.description: threshold absolute numerical integral of positive FOD lobes. Any lobe for which the integral is smaller than this threshold will be discarded. Default: 0.

inputs.name: fmls_peak_value
inputs.description: threshold peak amplitude of positive FOD lobes. Any lobe for which the maximal peak amplitude is smaller than this threshold will be discarded. Default: 0.1.

inputs.name: fmls_no_thresholds
inputs.description: disable all FOD lobe thresholding; every lobe where the FOD is positive will be retained.

inputs.name: fmls_lobe_merge_ratio
inputs.description: Specify the ratio between a given FOD amplitude sample between two lobes, and the smallest peak amplitude of the adjacent lobes, above which those lobes will be merged. This is the amplitude of the FOD at the 'bridge' point between the two lobes, divided by the peak amplitude of the smaller of the two adjoining lobes. A value of 1.0 will never merge two lobes into one; a value of 0.0 will always merge lobes unless they are bisected by a zero-valued crossing. Default: 1.

inputs.name: mask
inputs.description: only perform computation within the specified binary brain mask image.

inputs.name: maxnum
inputs.description: maximum number of fixels to output for any particular voxel (default: no limit)

inputs.name: nii
inputs.description: output the directions and index file in nii format (instead of the default mif)

inputs.name: dirpeak
inputs.description: define the fixel direction as that of the lobe's maximal peak as opposed to its weighted mean direction (the default)

inputs.name: info
inputs.description: display information messages.

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.description: display debugging messages.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: display version information and exit.

output-files.name: afd
output-files.description: output the total Apparent Fibre Density per fixel (integral of FOD lobe)

output-files.name: peak_amp
output-files.description: output the amplitude of the FOD at the maximal peak per fixel

output-files.description: output a measure of dispersion per fixel as the ratio between FOD lobe integral and maximal peak amplitude
